title: New: Teen Daze – The Future
content:
With a UK tour just around the corner, Canadian dreampopper Teen Daze has dropped one of his finest tracks to date in the form of the beautiful The Future.

Combining his shoegaze inspirations with a healthy dose of 80’s electro-pop, the floaty vocals and sumptuous synths drift magically throughout the track. The Future is taken from Teen Daze’s upcoming album All Of Us, Together, out 22 May, check out his tour dates below that.
